tangible_template.content:
How to create a pop-up without JavaScript

Ever wanted a pop-up mechanism on your website, but you don't want to use JavaScript? Here's how:

Toggle the How it works button for more info.

How it works

The scaling effect you see when you open this <details> element is created by using a keyframe animation.

@keyframes scale { 
 0% {
  transform: scale(0);
 }
 100% {
  transform: scale(1);
 }
}

This animation is added to the <div>, but only when the [open] attribute is toggled.

details[open] div { 
 animation: scale .15s ease;
}

Sadly there's no way (that I know of) to animate the <div> when the <details> is closing.

  /* Color - Variables */
  --base-hue: 260deg;
  --distance: 20deg;
  --darkness: 10%;
  /* Colors - Vibrant */
  --color-a: hsl(var(--base-hue), 100%, 50%);
  --color-b: hsl(calc(var(--base-hue) + (var(--distance) * 2)), 100%, 50%);
  --color-c: hsl(calc(var(--base-hue) + (var(--distance) * 3)), 100%, 50%);
  --color-d: hsl(calc(var(--base-hue) + (var(--distance) * 4)), 100%, 50%);
  /* Colors - Dark */
  --color-a-dk: hsl(var(--base-hue), 100%, var(--darkness));
  --color-b-dk: hsl(
    calc(var(--base-hue) + (var(--distance) * 2)),
    100%,
    var(--darkness)
  );
  --color-c-dk: hsl(
    calc(var(--base-hue) + (var(--distance) * 3)),
    100%,
    var(--darkness)
  );
  --color-d-dk: hsl(
    calc(var(--base-hue) + (var(--distance) * 4)),
    100%,
    var(--darkness)
  );
  /* Colors - Neutral */
  --color-bright: hsl(calc(var(--base-hue) + (var(--distance) * 1)), 100%, 99%);
  --color-dark: hsl(calc(var(--base-hue) + (var(--distance) * 1)), 100%, 1%);
  /* Colors - Stars */
  --color-stars-a: hsl(
    calc(var(--base-hue) + (var(--distance) * 1)),
    70%,
    60%,
    100%
  );
  --color-stars-b: hsl(
    calc(var(--base-hue) + (var(--distance) * 2)),
    50%,
    80%,
    60%
  );
  --color-stars-c: hsl(
    calc(var(--base-hue) + (var(--distance) * 3)),
    10%,
    80%,
    20%
  );
  /* Card GradientBackground */
  --bg-space: radial-gradient(
    circle at 0% 100%,
    var(--color-dark),
    20%,
    var(--color-a-dk),
    var(--color-dark),
    var(--color-a-dk),
    var(--color-dark)
  );
  /* radial-gradient(
    circle farthest-corner at center center,
    var(--color-dark), 20%,
    var(--color-a-dk), 
    var(--color-dark), 60%, 
    var(--color-a-dk), 
    var(--color-dark)
  ); */
  /* Card Styles */
  font-family: "Gill Sans", "Gill Sans MT", Calibri, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background-image: var(--bg-space);
  background-size: 300% 210%;
  box-shadow: var(--color-a) 0 3.4em 3.4em, var(--color-dark) 0 -0.8em 1.9em,
    var(--color-c) 0 0.3em 0.4em, var(--color-d) 0 0.8em 0.8em,
    var(--color-b) 0 -0.2em 0.3em;
  height: 400px;
  width: 280px;
  padding: 2rem;
  border-radius: 0.75rem;
  border: 0.05rem solid var(--color-c);
  animation: bg-gradient 15s linear infinite;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* Galaxy Stars - Smaller, Rotating */
.card::after {
  content: " ";
  position: absolute;
  top: 70%;
  left: 40%;
  width: 0.05rem;
  height: 0.05rem;
  border-radius: 1rem;
  background: transparent;
  background-size: 10% 10%;
  box-shadow: var(--stars-1);
  animation-name: space;
  animation-duration: 200s;
  animation-timing-function: linear;
  animation-iteration-count: infinite;
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* Galaxy Stars - Larger, Rotating */
.card span::before {
  content: " ";
  position: absolute;
  top: 80%;
  left: 30%;
  width: 0.055rem;
  height: 0.055rem;
  transform: rotate(45deg);
  background: transparent;
  background-size: 10% 10%;
  box-shadow: var(--stars-2);
  animation-name: space2;
  animation-duration: 320s;
  animation-timing-function: linear;
  animation-iteration-count: infinite;
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* Galaxy Stars - Flickering, Non-Rotating */
.content::after {
  content: " ";
  position: absolute;
  top: 100%;
  left: 50%;
  width: 0.06em;
  height: 0.06em;
  transform: rotate(45deg);
  background: transparent;
  background-size: 10% 10%;
  box-shadow: var(--stars-3);
  animation-name: space3;
  animation-duration: 12s;
  animation-timing-function: linear;
  animation-iteration-count: infinite;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.content {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  flex-direction: column;
  margin: 1rem;
}

/* Header Text */
.heading {
  font-size: 1rem;
  letter-spacing: 0.05rem;
  text-align: center;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  color: var(--color-bright);
  line-height: 2rem;
  z-index: 1;
  margin-top: .5rem;
  text-shadow: 2px 3px 5px var(--color-dark);
}

.heading span {
  display: block;
  text-align: justify;
  font-size: 3rem;
  color: var(--color-a);
  background-image: linear-gradient(
    45deg,
    var(--color-a),
    var(--color-b),
    var(--color-c),
    var(--color-d)
  );
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  font-weight: 700;
  animation-name: galaxy;
  animation-duration: 1s;
  animation-timing-function: linear;
  animation-iteration-count: infinite;
  text-shadow: none;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.item,
.item svg {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  font-size: 2rem;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  margin: 0.25rem;
  text-shadow: 2px 3px 5px var(--color-dark);
}

.item svg {
  margin-right: .5rem;
  height: 2rem;
  width: 2rem;
  filter: drop-shadow(3px 5px 2px var(--color-dark));
}

.item--create svg {
  color: var(--color-a);
  z-index: 1;
}

.item--create svg:hover {
  color: var(--color-a);
  animation: space2 1s linear infinite;
  cursor: pointer;
  z-index: 1;
}

.item--create {
  color: var(--color-a);
  z-index: 1;
}

.item--post svg {
  color: var(--color-b);
  z-index: 1;
}

.item--post svg:hover {
  color: var(--color-b);
  animation: space2 1s linear infinite;
  cursor: pointer;
  z-index: 1;
}

.item--post {
  color: var(--color-b);
  z-index: 1;
}

.item--inspire svg {
  color: var(--color-c);
  z-index: 1;
}

.item--inspire svg:hover {
  color: var(--color-c);
  animation: space2 1s linear infinite;
  cursor: pointer;
  z-index: 1;
}

.item--inspire {
  color: var(--color-c);
}

/* Button */
button {
  display: flex;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  margin-top: .5rem;
  position: relative;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  padding: 1rem 2rem;
  display: inline-block;
  border-radius: 1.75rem;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  border: none;
  font-family: inherit;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--color-dark);
  background-image: linear-gradient(
    45deg,
    var(--color-a),
    var(--color-b),
    var(--color-c),
    var(--color-d)
  );
  box-shadow: 0 1rem 1rem var(--color-dark);
  z-index: 1;
}

button:hover {
  transform: translateY(-3px);
  cursor: pointer;
  color: var(--color-bright);
  box-shadow: 0 10px 20px var(--color-a-dk);
}

button:active {
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 1rem 1rem var(--color-dark);
}

button::after {
  content: "";
  display: inline-block;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  border-radius: 1.75rem;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: -1;
  transition: all 0.4s;
}

button::after {
  background-color: var(--color-bright);
}

button:hover::after {
  transform: scaleX(1.4) scaleY(1.6);
  opacity: 0;
}

/*animations*/

/* Stars */
@keyframes space {
  from {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }

  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

@keyframes space2 {
  from {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }

  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

@keyframes space3 {
  0%,
  50%,
  100% {
    opacity: 1;
  }

  25%,
  75% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

/* Galaxy Span Text */
@keyframes galaxy {
  0%,
  50%,
  100% {
    background-position: 0% 100%;
  }

  10%,
  25%,
  75% {
    background-position: 100% 0%;
  }
}

/* Card Gradient Background */
@keyframes bg-gradient {
  0%,
  100% {
    background-position: 0% 100%;
  }

  25%,
  75% {
    background-position: 50% 50%;
  }

  50% {
    background-position: 100% 0%;
  }
}
